content.raw: Since you don’t have commit access to my fork, Bitbucket didn’t allow you to close the branch when merging, so I pushed an extra 2 commits to close it. I’ll give you commit access to my forks when making future pull requests to avoid leaving branches open, but if you don’t see the ‘close branch’ checkbox when merging, let me know.
content.html: Since you don’t have commit access to my fork, Bitbucket didn’t allow you to close the branch when merging, so I pushed an extra 2 commits to close it. I’ll give you commit access to my forks when making future pull requests to avoid leaving branches open, but if you don’t see the ‘close branch’ checkbox when merging, let me know.
